article: Do you have the ability to live cheaply? Now here's a true story of an American girl,Sarah.  _  Sarah left university,she began to live in New York City on her own.She  found  ,but the salary was  less than  $30,000 a year.Her parents thought her life would be hard,but Sarah  was able to  Iive on her salary and stilI saved $5,000 in a year.How was that  _  Cheap living  _  starts with keeping the big cost small.For most people,that  _  housing.So Sarah chose to share a flat with three other friends.Her next biggest cost was  _  .When she ate out,she went to cheap restaurants.  _  she bought a $9.99 whole chicken at a local restaurant.She then  _  the chicken bones home and made soup out of them.Nowadays young people often  _  ).But Sarah said,"I enjoy walking  _  .I love going to museums and parks." Did Sarah feel poor  because of  cheap living? Not really.She even managed to take two trips,one to the Netherlands,  the other  to Portland. "Don't think of saving money as something  _  .It's a kind of game,"said Sarah.
